title: Armour Pen Lucian Build (Help)
body: I know the core of the armour pen build for Lucian is Youmuus then cleaver but what comes after that? Is it situational or is there like a set item set to go after? Any help would be greatly appreciated! Thanks.

replies.body:
1) Make sure u take scaling 10% crd at level 18 glyhps so you hit 40% cdr when building zerkers.

2) Youmuus > Berserker Greives >  BC > PD (for dueling)/Rapid (for seige)/Shiv (for waveclear) .   **Those items are your core**

3) Then for your last items get a defensive (ga/banshees/merc/maw) as well as a  BT/IE
